name: Life Dot Lock
description:
An interactive fiction prototype about bad feelings and hacking.

Follow Guus on his Friday evening as he tries to reflect on his opinions towards his colleague. 

Additional credit goes to the following assets:

  • VGATypewriterSans by Void 
  • VoronoiLib by Logan Lembke 
  • Unity-BitmapFontImporter by Litefeel 
  • Jungle Pack by Jesse M
  • Monogram by Datagoblin
